In the 2021 movie 'Radhe', what is the relationship to the 2009 film 'Wanted'?
Options:
A. Radhe is a prequel to Wanted.
B. Radhe is reportedly a sequel to Wanted.

D. Radhe features the same characters as Wanted.
Correct Answer: Radhe is reportedly a sequel to Wanted.
